Subject: Recepient details in report shows unnecesary data - ||AZISTA||
Description: Hi, A customer with a trial console is facing issue where the destination shows the recepients and a lot of other unnecesary data. The entry is as follows : O=EXCHANGELABS/OU=EXCHANGE ADMINISTRATIVE GROUP (FYDIBOHF23SPDLT)/CN=RECIPIENTS/CN=56BD6A6D0A844B9793073724BA2E7098-7586EFF5-21;/o=ExchangeLabs/ou=Exchange Administrative Group (FYDIBOHF23SPDLT)/cn=Recipients/cn=e8f26e57267f4c978728705d1729d5ff-PPC20230828;ram.venkat@azista-aeg.com;harikrishna.vs@azistaindustries.com;murari.kasireddy@azista-aeg.com;/o=ExchangeLabs/ou=Exchange Administrative Group (FYDIBOHF23SPDLT)/cn=Recipients/cn=d1ac1fd42ef54318b03119929aa0bfd2-Purchase202 /o=ExchangeLabs/ou=Exchange Administrative Group (FYDIBOHF23SPDLT)/cn=Recipients/cn=f0655483a4844a4bb1341f12f1d0f89d-2ebc683f-c91.62 KBN/A Content Threat Detected2025-05-23 14:19:41ABADESKTOP026adwivediMail Attachment image004.pngOutlook (Attachments)E-maillukas.felderhoff@iq-technologies.berlin;klaus.jaeckel@iq-technologies.berlin;mathias.reibe@iq-technologies.berlin;space@iq-technologies.berlin;/o=ExchangeLabs/ou=Exchange Administrative Group (FYDIBOHF23SPDLT)/cn=Recipients/cn=d1ac1fd42ef54318b03119929aa0bfd2-Purchase202;/o=ExchangeLabs/ou=Exchange Administrative Group (FYDIBOHF23SPDLT)/cn=Recipients/cn=7f6f0c8148a94f5dab36e79a9e75312a-7359b712-69;/o=ExchangeLabs/ou=Exchange Administrative Group (FYDIBOHF23SPDLT)/cn=Recipients/cn=e9649db2b788402. It makes the report difficult for the customer to read. Can you please let me know how we can only have the email IDs mentioned instead of the additional details ? Regards, Sidharth Kumar
What_We_Know__c:
26.05
- the customer is complaining of unnecessary details in the reports
- asked for additional details and a screenshot for a better understanding

28.05
- the customer provided a screenshot and some details about their server
- reached out to T2

29.05
- I let the customer know that we cannot shorten the details
Next_Steps__c:
26.05
- waiting on the customer to provide further information

28.05
- waiting on T2

29.05
- waiting on the customer/closure
Solution_Comment__c: the customer confirmed the ticket can be closed after we provided the answer to their question: There is no option to shorten the email details since that is the way we see and check email domains with DPI.
